content: on rs row 22 work buttonhole 4 into the left front band while working the body buttonhole 5 on rs row 30 work buttonhole 5 into the left front band © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 14 work straight until rs row 35 or the body reaches your planned length note half brioche relaxes with wear if you are between lengths consider stopping slightly shorter than your usual preference d hem transition to hem hem row 1a rs with mc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif x 4 times *k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif repeat from * to the last body stitch p2tog sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif x 3 times hem row 1b rs with cc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 x 4 times *sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to the next band stitches sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyib p1 x 4 times hem row 2a ws with mc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 x 4 times *sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to the next band stitches sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyib p1 x 4 times hem row 2b ws with cc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif x 4 times *k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif repeat from * to the next band stitches p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif x 4 times hem row 3a rs with mc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif x 4 times *k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif repeat from * to the next band stitches p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif x 4 times hem row 3b rs with cc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 x 4 times *sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to the next band stitches sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyib p1 x 4 times repeat hem row 2-3 until the hem is measured 4 cm or to the desired depth e bind off bind off all stitches using a 1×1 tapestry bind-off work the bind-off evenly section 4 sleeves a sleeve set-up sleeves are worked top-down in the round beginning from the held sleeve stitches at the yoke split © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 15 return sleeve stitches to needle with rs facing place the held sleeve stitches for one sleeve onto a circular needle or dpns join underarm ● join new yarn at the underarm ● pick up and knit the 7 underarm stitches co for the body at that side ● place a marker at the centre of the underarm to indicate the beginning of round bor sleeve orientation ensure that ● the half brioche stitch alignment matches the body fabric ● the last brioche stitches remain worked stitches not slipped c cuff
